content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_block
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 24, "index": 27}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 9, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a lapis block, I need to place lapis lazuli in a 3x3 grid in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the lapis lazuli from slot 45 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
